entries.description:
Usability enhancements to the CloudFormation UI 
 - color coding status similar to the AWS Console
 - preventing multiple tabs opening for the same stack (#798)
 - opening from AWS Explorer with right-click instead of double click (#799)
 - adding status reason to event view
Open README.md file after creating a project
Auto-create run configurations when using the New Project wizard
Fix unable to map paths that have `.` or `..` in them
Do not load proxy settings from Java system properties since it conflicts with IDE setting
Make sure we commit all open documents if using a file-based event input (#910)
Fix being unable to open an empty credentials/config file for editing
